name: Color & Animal bump
description:
Use WASD to move. 

Left Click to interact with any UI. 

The Pause button is on the Top Left of the screen. 

You can only touch with the White objects, If you touch with the animated Animals or the colored objects, you lose.  Try to reach the end of the level. And fill your health.
Good luck.

Link to Project File: https://github.com/Talha991s/GameEngine4-GameJam.git

Download, unzip and open .exe to play.
